fields.name: bag
fields.description: Our tote bag is sturdy and stylish, with a vivid double-sided print.
fields.material: Shell material: 100% polyester. Strap material: 100% cotton.
fields.dimensions: Bag interior: 46 cm x 46 cm (18” x 18”). Strap length: 74 cm (29”).

fields.name: coasters
fields.description: Our set of 4 coasters keeps your surfaces clean and dry. It is suitable for any drink, hot or cold.
fields.material: Surface material: lightweight glossy MDF. Backing material: non-scratch cork.
fields.dimensions: Each coaster is 9.5 x 9.5 cm (3.75” x 3.75”)

fields.name: mug
fields.description: Our classic ceramic mug is perfect for coffee, tea, or any other drink.
fields.dimensions: Holds 325 ml (11 oz). Diameter is 8.2 cm (3.2”), not including handle.

fields.name: notebook
fields.description: Our smart spiral notebook comes with a handy document pocket inside the back cover.
fields.material: Cover: 350gsm card. Interior: 90gsm paper stock (ruled lines).

fields.name: pillow
fields.description: Our accent cushion adds a wow factor to any room. The concealed zip keeps it sleek and easy to clean.
fields.material: Cover and filling are machine-washable 100% polyester.

fields.name: print
fields.description: Our gallery-grade framed prints serve as worthy centrepieces for years to come.
fields.material: Frame: high-quality timber, painted with a matte black finish. Pane: premium acrylic, clearer and lighter than glass.
